casebody.data:
Samuel J. RIGGS, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent. WD 81521 Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District. ORDER FILED: JUNE 18, 2019 S. Kate Webber, Kansas City, MO, Counsel for Appellant. Richard A. Starnes, Jefferson City, MO, Counsel for Respondent. Before Division Three: Mark D. Pfeiffer, Presiding Judge, Lisa White Hardwick, Judge, Anthony Rex Gabbert, Judge

ORDER

Per Curiam:

Samuel J. Riggs appeals the circuit court's denial of his Rule 24.035 motion for post-conviction relief. We affirm. Rule 84.16(b).
